alert.note: Alert for Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:26AM MST until March 05 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with locally higher amounts in the Sawtooths. Winds gusting 30 to 45 MPH. * WHERE...The Shoshone Lava Beds, Lost River Valley, and Sawtooth/Stanley Basin, including but not limited to Shoshone, Carey, Willow Creek Summit, Mackay, Arco, Howe, Stanley, and Banner Summit. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous with slick roads, low visibility, and blowing and drifting snow across highways.
info.instruction: If you will be traveling across the advisory area, slow down, use extra caution, and plan extra time to reach your destination. The latest highway conditions are available at 511.idaho.gov, the Idaho 511 App, or by calling 511.

area.areaDesc: Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Shoshone, Lava Beds
